p:
The CO 2 production was measured on triplicates from each bulk sample (with in-situ water contents) at 5 °C. This was done in a setup with an LI-840 CO 2/H 2O Gas analyzer (LICOR ® Biosciences) connected to a pump, two valves and a vial with a butyl septum via rubber tubing and two hypodermic needles. Gas samples with known volumes were injected into the analytical system through the septum, and their relative CO 2 concentration was calculated as:
